ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Type_of_Price_Dispute__c , "Product/Delivery"), OR( ISBLANK (Order_Number__c ), ISBLANK (Invoice_Number__c ), ISBLANK (Company_Name__c ), ISBLANK(Text( Requested_Amount_of_Change__c )) ), $Setup.Validation_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Check all required fields - Account Name; Contact Name; Delivery Channel; Company Name; LMS Order Number (RCS Number); Invoice Number; State
